alert.note: Alert for Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 4:35AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Mermentau River Near Mermentau For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1245 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mermentau River near Mermentau. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 2.1 Wed 4 am CST 2.7 3.4 3.9 &&
